sponsor: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)
briefTitle: Ginkgo Biloba Prevention Trial in Older Individuals
officialTitle: Ginkgo Biloba Prevention Trial in Older Individuals

interventions.name: Placebo
otherNames: Identical appearance as Ginkgo biloba pill

summary: This study will determine the effect of 240mg/day Ginkgo biloba in decreasing the incidence of dementia and specifically Alzheimer's disease (AD), slowing cognitive decline and functional disability, reducing incidence of cardiovascular disease, and decreasing total mortality.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Incident Dementia
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Brief neuropsychological testing every 6 months, detailed testing annually, average 6.1 years follow up

commonTop: Self-reported non-hospitalized symptom collected every 6 months
